channel.title: Verbal Diarrhea: The Podcast for Movie Fans!
channel.description:
Your podcast for everything you never wanted to know about movies - OUR reviews!
A podcast by two moviefreaks from sydney reviewing the movies we have seen, talking bout everything concerning movies and more.
Offical Site: http://vd-verbal-diarrhea.blogspot.com
channel.itunes:author: Kat & Mel
channel.itunes:summary:
Your podcast for everything you never wanted to know about movies - OUR reviews!

item.title: X-Men 3 : Verbal Diarrhea DVD Commentary
item.description: Hey everyone, As mentioned in our fourth episode we promised to upload a commentary we did for the X-men 3 DVD release. So here it is, we hope you enjoy it....
item.dc:creator: Kat & Mel
item.itunes:summary: Hey everyone, As mentioned in our fourth episode we promised to upload a commentary we did for the X-men 3 DVD release. So here it is, we hope you enjoy it....

item.title: Kat and Mel's Movie Randomness: Ep4
item.description:
We made it to Episode IV and this week we have a monsterous special for you which includes three SCARY movies: hehehe well not really but check it out just the same. We review: A Nightmare Before Christmas (3D) Saw III The Grudge 2 As well as the trailers for DeJaVu and Tenacious D Featured song is "Scotty Doesn't Know" by Lustra
Enjoy the madness as we infect your system with Verbal Diarrhea!!!

item.title: Kat and Mel's Movie Randomness: Ep3
item.description: Episode III of our Podcast is online! This fortnight we review: Little Miss Sunshine and Children of Men and plenty more. Featured songs include: "This is Halloween" by Danny Elfman from "Nightmare Before Christmas" film soundtrack.
item.dc:creator: Kat & Mel

item.title: Kat and Mels Movie Randomness: Ep2
item.description: Episode II of our Podcast with better sound quality!!!!!! We review Friends with Money, The Ant Bully, World Trade Center Featured song: "You Suck" by The Murmurs Visit our blogsite http://vd-verbal-diarrhea.blogspot.com/
